name: NMI Holdings, Inc.
description: NMI Holdings, Inc. is a leading provider of private mortgage insurance (PMI) in the United States. Founded in 2011 and headquartered in Walnut Creek, California, NMI aims to enhance the home-buying experience by offering innovative mortgage insurance solutions that protect lenders from borrower defaults. The company operates primarily in the residential mortgage market, providing coverage for loans that exceed 80% of the home's value, thereby enabling borrowers to purchase homes with lower down payments. NMI is known for its technology-driven approach to risk management and customer service, utilizing advanced analytics to streamline the underwriting process and improve efficiency. The company prides itself on its commitment to responsible lending practices and its role in supporting homeownership across the country. NMI's robust capital position and strong relationships with mortgage lenders allow it to deliver reliable and flexible insurance products. Furthermore, the company is dedicated to transparency and operational excellence, ensuring that its clients receive the best possible service in a competitive marketplace. NMI continues to grow and innovate, adapting to the evolving needs of the housing finance industry while maintaining a focus on quality and customer satisfaction.
